about.p1: Since starting my career as a Frontend Engineer in January 2023, I’ve gained experience with technologies like React, Next.js, and WordPress.
about.p2: My passion lies in designing and developing websites that are not only visually striking but also highly performant.
about.p3: I actively seek opportunities to challenge myself and deepen my knowledge in web development.

works.title: Serita Homes
works.description:
[Overview]
I created a landing page for Serita Homes Co., Ltd. The design reflects the company's brand image while focusing on a simple and user-friendly UI.

[Technologies Used]
PHP (WordPress), Sass, JavaScript, Swiper.js (slider implementation), IntersectionObserver (scroll animation)

[Key Features]
- Dynamic content generation using WordPress
- Contact Form 7 for inquiry form

[Highlights]
- Responsive slider with Swiper.js & auto-scroll
- Improved UX with lazy loading using IntersectionObserver

works.title: UTAGE SAPPORO
works.description:
[Overview]
I created a homepage for UTAGE SAPPORO. The design incorporates neon-like effects to reflect the club’s atmosphere.

[Technologies Used]
WordPress, Sass, JavaScript

[Key Features]
- Dynamic content generation using WordPress
- Responsive design

[Highlights]
- Live Feel on the Top View: A video is embedded beneath an image on the top view to create a dynamic, immersive experience.
- Neon Effect on Mobile: On smartphone screens, event titles have a dual-line effect—one solid line and one blurred line—to enhance the neon aesthetic.
